curve-angle-distance.png.description: a tight cluster of points around an invisible parabola

curve-angle-distance-linear3.png.description: a tight cluster of points around a parabola, with a horizontal line cutting through the point cloud

fuel-efficiency-scatter.png.description: a tight cluster of points around an invisible parabola, with a poorly-fitting linear model plotted on top
